channel.title: Stull Si:Al Charts
channel.description:
## Influences of Variable Silica and Alumina on Porcelain Glazes
R. T. Stull Transactions of the American Ceramic Society, Volume 14, pages 62-70. https://books.google.com/books?id=9qwYAQAAIAAJ
[Linked paper here](/t/influences-of-variable-silica-and-alumina-on-porcelain-glazes/)
## Deformation Temperatures of Some Porcelain Glazes
R. T. Stull & W. L. Howat Transactions of the American Ceramic Society volume 16 https://books.google.com/books?id=UmlLAAAAMAAJ&dq=Transactions%20of%20the%20American%20Ceramic%20Society%20volume%20xvi&q=stull%20howat#v=snippet&q=stull%20howat&f=false
## Glaze Development with Application of Unity Molecular Formula
Hyunggoo No, Soomin Kim, Ungsoo Kim†, Wooseok Cho Korea Institute of Ceramic Engineering & Technology, Icheon 17303, Korea https://www.e-sciencecentral.org/articles/SC000019901
## Influence of Variable Alumina and Silica on the Relative Viscosity of a Porcelain Glaze
Sidney Sewell BS Thesis, University of Illinois, 1914 https://archive.org/details/influenceofvaria00sewe
